    • createGiftCertificateTag

      public int createGiftCertificateTag(GiftCertificateTag giftCertificateTag)
      A repository method that create a new giftCertificateTag in db , by calling a query from SQLQueries class and using jdbcTemplate
      Parameters:
      giftCertificateTag - a GiftCertificateTag object that are going to be added in db

    • getGiftCertificateByName

      public List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificateByName(String name)
      A repository method for getting all gift certificates by name , by calling a query from SQLQueries class
      Parameters:
      name - a name or part of name for searching in db

    • getGiftCertificateByDescription

      public List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificateByDescription(String description)
      A repository method for getting all gift certificates by description , by calling a query from SQLQueries class
      Parameters:
      description - a name or part of name for searching in db

    • getSortedGiftCertificateByName

      public List<GiftCertificate> getSortedGiftCertificateByName(boolean asc)
      A repository method for getting sorted gift certificates list by name and by calling a query from SQLQueries class
      Parameters:
      asc - a boolean variable that in case of true will return gift certificate list in ascending row, and in case of false in descending row

    • getSortedGiftCertificateByCreateDate

      public List<GiftCertificate> getSortedGiftCertificateByCreateDate(boolean asc)
      A repository method for getting sorted gift certificates list by creation date and by calling a query from SQLQueries class
      Parameters:
      asc - a boolean variable that in case of true will return gift certificate list in ascending row, and in case of false in descending row

    • getSortedGiftCertificateByNameAndCreateDate

      public List<GiftCertificate> getSortedGiftCertificateByNameAndCreateDate(boolean nameIsAsc, boolean createDateIsAsc)
      A repository method for getting sorted gift certificates list by name and creation date in the time and by calling a query from SQLQueries class
      Parameters:
      nameIsAsc - boolean variable that in case of true will return a sorted gift certificate list by name in ascending row, and in case of false in descending row
      createDateIsAsc - boolean variable that in case of true will return a sorted gift certificate list by name in ascending row, and in case of false in descending row
